law.catch_line: Ordinances, rules, regulations and orders affecting waters controlled by Florida Statutes, Chapter 373, reenacted.

text.section:
Sec. 7-01. Ordinances, rules, regulations and orders affecting waters controlled by Florida Statutes, Chapter 373, reenacted.
All ordinances, rules, regulations and orders of Dade County affecting the waters in the State controlled under the provisions of Chapter 373, Florida Statutes, are hereby reenacted, affirmed, validated and declared to be valid.
